chapter.title: Hardware Setup
chapter.para: This chapter contains links to reference material that you can use to configure hardware drivers for different types of SS7 cards.

&THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; supports dahdi-based SS7 cards like diguim and sangoma. Generally, dahdi-based SS7 cards do not include MTP2/MTP3 support on board, and rely on external software to provide these services.
&THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; also supports dialogic-based SS7 cards, which include on board support for MTP2/MTP3.
